title: Privacy Policy
welcomeMessage: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We may collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account or contact us.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy.
